1.content:
Pick a story line to follow.

Your choices below are...
1.title: Pick a story

choices: the eating contest was in 1 day and she had to be ready.
the eating contest was in 1 week and began training at once.
the eating contest was in 1 month and she bulked herself up
11.content: One day in new york city georgette the poodle was but looking in the mirror at herself and wondered to herself how would i look plus sized she said to herself and soon enough an flyer for an eating contest arrived and it mentioned the grand prize was a lifetime supply of ubermass dog food and $1,000,000 prize money awarded to the winner.Then she said i would love to enter this contest and prove to everyone in this city when it comes to competitive eating i'm number 1 and also the best around but wait i'd have to train for this competition she said and eventually she did.
11.title: Georgette gets entered in an eating contest

choices: Tito and georgette go on a plus sized date in new york.
Georgette and tito decide to eat the lifetime supply of ubermass dogfood
111.content:
So georgette realized she had one day to get ready for the eating contest and of course she had her plus sized boyfriend tito help her train for the eating contest she was about to enter.

Tito: alright my soon to be plus sized sweetheart i've brought you something special to eat to help you have an advantage for your eating competition and here it is i hope you'll like it.

Of course tito had brought in a brand new dessert called the most fattening hot fudge sundae ever seen.

Tito: what do think my love? he asked

Georgette: tito you've done it again and also i'm feeling really hungry so it's chow time for me sweetie.

And so georgette began eating the most fattening hot fudge sundae ever seen and with every bite she had, her body began to get bigger heavier and rounder than ever before. After she was done eating she let loose a burp that even made tito proud of her.

Georgette: *lets loose a huge burp* URPPP mmm that was good now it's time to rest up for the night and get ready for tomorrrow.

And so the day of the competition arrived as tito a rather plus sized chihuahua who was indeed tall and morbidly obese accompanied his sweetheart a now 850lbs poodle who was heavily stomping to where her seat was. As soon as she got there she noticed a few other plus sized female contestants as well along with their plus sized loving husbands who were to cheer on their wives. Then the competition began as georgette simply dominated from the start as she was eating every kind of fattening food she got her paws on until she was officially declared the winner of the new york state eating competition and was awarded the prize of $1,000,000 and a lifetime supply of ubermass dogfood for her friends and herself.

Tito: sweetheart i'm so proud of you for winning and as an added bonus we'll go on a date together if you want to.

Georgette: tito my plus sized hunk i'd love to.
111.title: the eating contest was in 1 day and she had to ...

choices: Georgette uses ALL of her money to hire people to feed her
Georgette becomes gassy and gains with every burp/fart
She becomes bigger than the room the contest was held in
1112.content:
"Oh my, Tito! We won, we won! Now it's time for a snack." Georgette exclaimed.
"Honey, I didn't think you were so excited about this," Tito questioned,
"Well, the money is worth it! I may be fat, but there's now more of me to love..." Winked the plus-sized poodle. Tito nodded with his tongue dripping out of his maw. Georgette sexily ate some of the Ubermass dog-food. Tito seemed to like it, he sat back, enjoying the show. Tito snapped out of his trance.
"Wait sweetheart, weren't we gonna go on a date?" Tito remembered, but the poodle was too busy stuffing herself with the dog-food. She started slow and seductive, but she looked and ate like a pig as she progressed. "This is a date enough..." Said the poodle with her mouth full.
Tito was shocked, she's never rejected a date, OR talked with her mouth full. "I think we should go home now fluffernutter..." The chihuahua gestured. He looked at Georgette who was defiantly bigger. Her butt has formed large cheeks that blocked his vision, her gut sagged into the floor, nearly stuck there, her face has developed many chins, and her legs were inflated like sausages. Worst part was, she was still getting bigger, with no signs of stopping.
Soon-

11123.content:
Georgette herself was now bigger than the room the contest was held in as she now had a giant sized butt, her gut was now gigantic as it still sagged into the floor, her face was that of a now giant fat monster and her legs that were inflated like sausages, had now inflated to that of Godzilla or King Kong's size as Georgette's shadow loomed over poor Tito himself and the room itself as Tito was now worried about Georgette as he thought to himself aloud.

"There's only one thing a chihuahua like myself can do at a time like this, in other words I better run for my life." The chihuahua said. Soon enough Tito ran out of the room and the building the contest was held in as Georgette herself got up as she smashed the roof of the building which was now reduced to nothing but rubble itself as eyewitnesses, onlookers, their pets and Tito himself couldn't help but look up at Georgette herself as her shadow was now looming over everyone and everything around her.

Soon enough....

choices: Tito wants to apologize for running away from Georgette.
12.title: A present? How sweet!

choices: "Wanna go out for a date & go to the buffet?"
121.content:
Tito came back from his gang & wants to apologize her. He climbs the latter and breaks in, because of the opened window.

Tito: "uhh... Hello?"

Georgette: "Huh, who's there? Who breaks my home?!"

Georgette turns on a light, shocked.

Georgette: "Tito?"

Tito: "Hey. So uhh... Are you sleeping?

Georgette: "Yeah, and why are you here?"

Tito: (Sigh) "There's something I want to say to you. I felt bad about ran away from you, because I was scared of taking bath."

Georgette: "Wait, you ran away on purpose? Not only..."

Tito: "And I made a mistake for a date. So yes, I ditch you. I know how you feel, and I shouldn't have done it."

Georgette: "Oh really? Ditching me?"

Tito: "Yes. Listen, all I wanted to do is to have a date, but not that one. I wanted to hang out. This is the only plan I have. I didn't ask for a date. And for a wedding."

Georgette: "I don't get it. But is it true?"

Tito: "Yeah. Remember the last time you set up for a bath? I'm too small. And I didn't want to drown. You could've killed me. I just hate bath."

Georgette: "But I never kill anyone."

Tito: "I didn't..."

Georgette: "No no. I understand everything."

Tito: "But not this one. You broke up with you. Because I tried to apologize you, but you ignored me and yelled at me, which is you're rude, and won't let me in since Christmas."

Georgette hears the door closing.

Georgette: "Wait, hold that though."

She ran away. Tito checked Jenny's clock. It's 7:00 P.M. Tito has no idea what to say anything else until Georgette comes back. His tears falling and wanted to admit it. Georgette came back.

Georgette: "Okay they're gone. What are you trying to say? And you're...?"

Tito: "Georgette. It's a long story. So, I'm really sorry for running away from you, ditching you, ditching bath and ruining Jenny's Birthday Party. I know, you're still mad at me. I have no choice but to leave you alone."

Georgette: "No, don't leave. I really love the way you told me in English. Have you ever earn English on your own?"

Tito: "Not really. Wait, do I smell bad?"

Georgette smells him.

Georgette: "Ugh, yeah."

Tito: "Georgette. It's really hard to answer, but will you forgive me? I'll do anything for you. I promise I won't do it again. Especially for bath time."

Georgette: Oh god, why is this happening again? I don't want him here, but he needs home, girlfriend, and food. What should I do? I have my chocolate, my bowl, my bed, and my stuff. Do I have to share it? Wait! I remember my butler is going for groceries. We're out of dog food. But is it impossible, since Cinderella would live happily ever after exist which I really wish? Oh wait, he was marrying her, that's why. I would love to try it out too. Especially when I watch Lady & The Tramp. I have no choice but to do this.
121.title: Chapter #1 "Will you forgive me?"

13.content:
Jenny along with Georgette and Oliver were attending one of her school friend's birthday parties in Central Park that afternoon.Georgette and Oliver of course brought along their appetites for they anticipated plenty of 'free samples" of food courtesy of the kids who always love it whenever Jenny brought them with her to a gathering.They mainly stayed off to the side while the children played and the adults talked amongst themselves.This being a child's party though it wasn't long before the attention of the children shifted to them and they were up to their heads in head rubs and comments of "Cute!" "Adorable!!" and "Fluffy!!!" ....and food. Whatever pieces of cake, sandwiches, candy(none of which was chocolate), and ice cream the children could sneak past their parents they generously gave to their four-legged guests until an adult called out "Time for cake kids!!!" at which point everybody gethered by the head dining room table where the birthday cake was.

"Urp!! boy I've never eaten so much ever" Oliver moaned lying on his belly which was nearly five times its normal size. "But those peanut butter crunchies were just perfect..*burp* don't you think so Miss Georgette?" Georgette lay on her, rubbing her own tummy that was ten times bigger than normal "Awwwwww yes,...the egg salad sandwiches were especially delicious...all thirty of them "URRRRRPPP!!!!!!" oops parden me" she added with a blush. "Anyways...what do you say we have have some fun while they're preoccupied with their cake" she said as she got up and stretched a bit. "Have fun with what?" Oliver asked uncertain what she was refering to. "Oh you'll see soon enough...now come on while it's only us!" with that she grabbed the portly kitten back of his neck and carried him over the gift table. Once there they decided to...

Georgette: i know what you mean *burps* i never ate so much before..... if i eat anymore i feel like im going to explode! *she eyes a blueberry cupcake on the table* welll.... maybe one more wouldn't hurt me....*she grabs it and took a bite out of it* and then she...

1313.content:
And the moment georgette ate that blueberry cupcake she started turing blue and growing bigger and heavier in the process when finally she was over 25ft tall and weighed 22 tons possibly outgrowing the mansion they were all in.Now all that remained was rubble and a giant blueberry poodle with some monstrous thoughts on her mind.Then oliver the cat immediately noticed a giant blue poodle just standing in front of him and wondered what happened to her.

oliver: georgette that blueberry cupcake you ate, it turned you into a giant blueberry poodle now what are you going to do?

that's when georgette the poodle said to oliver in a deep booming voice that was loud enough for all of new york to hear.

georgette: oliver don't be alarmed but now i'm a giant blueberry poodle and since i'm gigantic, i'm going to go have a few bites in the city and take a walk while i'm at it so see you around you expendable little extra.

so georgette the gigantic blueberry poodle started stomping off towards unspecting downtown times square and possibly wreaking havoc and eating everything in sight in new york.

he decides to get engaged to her and asks her to marry him.
13132.content:
As the blueberry doggie doughgirl was just about to start her rampage, some effects from that blueberry cupcake started making her grow from being 25ft tall to at least 50ft tall and then she started making her way towards downtown new york city.As soon as she got into part of downtown new york all traffic in that area stopped as soon as they heard giant footsteps approaching they all started running away in terror as the 50ft tall blueberry doggie doughgirl appeared and began wreaking havoc by eating every building in sight even devouring madison square garden in the process.

blueberry doggie doughgirl: MMM MADISON SQUARE GARDEN SURE IS YUMMY she said in a booming voice.

Meanwhile tito a.k.a. superdog new york's resident superhero was doing business selling dog food to his friends dodger einstein and francis at his dog food stand.

Tito: here's your usual dog food meal dodger einstein here's yours with gravy and francis here's yours with some british dogfood.

dodger: thanks tito this stuff's pretty good i'll admit

einstein: thank you tito i'm really going to like eating this of course.

francis: i say tito you've really done a good job of running this dogfood stand of yours, i'd give it a five star rating.

tito: well thank you everyone for your compliments and it's nothing really, after all it was all thanks to hard work and dedication of course.Hey do you guys see something gigantic coming this way? because i sure do.

and tito did see something gigantic coming towards him and suddenly without warning the blueberry doggie doughgirl's shadow loomed over tito's dogfood stand.

dodger: yikes it's the blueberry doggie doughgirl run for your lives!

einstein: i'm getting out of here now see you around tito!

francis: goodbye tito i'll see you later for now i'm going to run for cover!

tito: alright who's the wiseguy scaring away my customers? he asked.
Then tito could only look up in complete and utter horror as the blueberry doggie doughgirl was about to devour tito's dogfood stand in the process.

blueberry doggie doughgirl: MMMMMM WHAT A DELICIOUS DOGFOOD STAND I CAN EAT.

Then she picked up tito's dogfood stand with him still inside and tito told her
tito: hey put down my dogfood stand you overgrown blueberry. Then she started eating the building as tito managed to get out of there just in time.

bluerberry doggie doughgirl: MMMMMM YUMMY she bellowed:

tito: nobody eats my dogfood stand and gets away with it.A guy's gotta put his paw down somewhere.Unforunately so do blueberry doggie doughgirls.

blueberry doggie doughgirl: MMMMMMM SKYSCRAPER CUPCAKES MY FAVORITE she said just as she munched a nearby building's water tower.

tito: allright that does it i may look like a mildmannered dogfood stand worker but in reality i'm ta-da superdog. All right you overgrown blueberry i order you to surrender or else.

blueberry doggie doughgirl: OR ELSE WHAT?

superdog: why do they always ask that? or else i'll huff and puff right now until i faint right now.

And faint he did as he landed in the palm of the monster's hand.

blueberry doggie doughgirl: MMMMMMM YOU MAKE A GREAT GINGERBREAD SUPERDOG she said.

Then dodger einstein and francis arrived on time.

dodger: guys we gotta do something fast.Einstein and Francis go get me my beast blaster.
einstein & francis: okay dodger we'll go get it for you right now.Okay dodger we've brought you your beast blaster you need.
dodger: one blast from this and that beast will be no more.
And so they aimed their beast blaster at the creature and fired it straight at her.As soon it hit her she dropped super dog into a nearby dumpster.
Einstein and francis: dodger we think something's wrong they said.
dodger: what you do mean i said yeast blaster? do you know what yeast does?
einstein and francis: no
dodger: it makes dough get bigger.Yikes
Immediately she started becoming the size of the earth thus hungrily staring at the north pole.
blueberry doggie doughgirl: OOH GOODY I WONDERED WHAT AN EARTH CUPCAKE WOULD TASTE LIKE? YUMMY AND DELICIOUS she said.
After she became the size of the earth, the three scientists that were at tito's dogfood stand ran over to the alleyway where superdog was at.

dodger: no problem i along with my assistants can make you as big as her.

superdog: oh that's different.

And so they started inflating superdog until he became the size as his girlfriend the blueberry doggie doughgirl and walked over to her while she was still eating the earth.That's when she noticed him and said:

superdog: HELLO THERE MY OVERSTUFFED BLUEBERRY SWEETIE PIE

133.content:
They then got to the gift table, and Georgette placed Oliver down on his back, exposing his fatter belly, and making sure he would not be able to get up for quite a bit. She lay down next to him, in much the same position, her larger waistline just as exposed as Oliver's stomach. She then explained: "See, after they have cake, they're going to come over to get the presents opened. Thing is, though, that we'll give them an extra present. There's no way they'll be able to resist giving us belly rubs when they see us like this, and they're all going to make it last a good, long time. I've seen how much children like giving cats and dogs belly rubs. They can't get enough of it." "Hey, sounds like we're in for a real treat!" Oliver smiled. "We sure are." Georgette smiled back. "Just close your eyes and wait for the nice feeling of tummy rubbing..." So they lay back and closed their eyes, and it was not long, since kids tend to eat cake at a rapid rate due to how much they like the way it tastes, before they were hearing: "Oh-Em-Gee! THAT IS SO CUTE AND DARLING! Let's rub them before the gifts get opened!" and then feeling their bigger bellies being rubbed, caressed, petted, stroked and kissed by child after child, said rubbing lasting so long and being so nice that neither Oliver nor Georgette ever wanted it to end. "Oh, you were right, Georgette. This IS fun." Oliver purred. "Told you it would be." Georgette replied. "Who knows? I bet Jenny might even bring home some of the treats and such and let us have some when her parents aren't looking." "Wouldn't that be super?" Oliver agreed.

After a while, the kids finished up with the belly rubs and got to opening the gifts, but Oliver and Georgette suddenly opened their eyes when...
133.title: Get Into Position For Tummy Rubs

14.content: Georgette had just used a cell phone to call Tito over for a date. And now, swhe has to wait for him to arrive. She is bored waiting, there's no one in today, except Oliver, but he's snoozing and does not want to wake him up. She then decided to look around and find anything interesting, until a closet door suddenly opens and a bunch of stuff falls out. she does not get covered by the stuff, and Oliver does not wake up to the sound of the crashing. When she attempted to put all the stuff back in, she saw this vaccuum cleaner: the Suck-O-Lux. Georgette, for some reason, decided to leav this out of the closet as she put all the other stuff back in. She then laid herself on the couch and just looked at the Suck-O-Lux.

The Poodle exclaimed while reaching for the off switch, but she slips & snout gets caught in the hose & suddenly her belly began to expand raipdly! Her belly inflated 25 feet wide & that's when Oliver came in the room... & unplugged it & loud "POP" sound was heard when the vaccum came off her snout! "Whew, that was close!" Said the kitten. He turned around & saw Georgette's big ballooned belly... "Um... Georgette... your belly it's so... big!" The Poodle looked & Olvier with her puffed up cheeks & holding her breath & smiling... "Imma leave now..." The kitten said & he does so. Georgette seemed to be enjoying her big inflated belly of hers & decides to keep the air inside of her & relax until Tito arrives & then...
141.title: Oh boy!

choices: Yes, and she then licks and cuddles him.
No, she keeps tickling him until he wets himself.
No, though after she's done tickling him, she gives him a tummy rub.
1412.content:
Just then, Oliver had reentered the room and Georgette went: "WHA? What are you doing back in here? I thought I drove you off with my ghoulish grin!" "Yeah, but when I saw how huge your belly was, I suddenly saw a once in a lifetime opportunity to tickle you there, and though I didn't think to even think about it at first, I now can tell I can't resist the urge. I'm so sorry, Georgette. I know you'll probably hate me for this, but this is the only chance I'll ever get to do this, and I just can't pass it up. Please forgive me." "Don't you dare tickle me!" Georgette snarled, but she couldn't exactly do much as she suddenly started laughing. Oliver tickled her all over her belly with his forepaws, tail, hair tuft, tongue and even his whiskers, and there was nothing she could do but burst out into helpless laughter. "HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!!!!!!!! YOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOU STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP THAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAT NOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOW!!!!!" Georgette barked between laughs. "No can do, Georgette. This is the one and only time I get to do this, but I promise you I'll be content after this one time I can remember, treasure and enjoy the memory of forever!" "WAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! I SWAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAR TOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO GOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOD YOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOU'REHEHEHEHEHE GOHOHOHOHOHNNAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA GEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHET IT FOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOR THIS!!!" Georgette cackled as she threw her head back in laughter and tears of laughter came out of her eyes. Ironically, she had soon laughed so much that all of the inflating helium she'd taken in from the vacuum had gone out of her, and she was back to normal, much to Oliver's surprise as well as her own.

"Well, what do you know? You've tickled me back to normal! Allow me to thank you for it..." Georgette said, getting back on all four feet and looking down at him with a cruel grin. Oliver backed away a bit and said: "Georgette, please, don't hurt me. I was just having fun. Being playful." "Hurt you?" Georgette replied. "Who said anything about hurting you? I have no intentions of harming you..." "Oh, that's a relief." Oliver replied. Suddenly, though, she flipped him over onto his back and put her paws on his belly, prompting Oliver to say: "Georgette? What are you doing?" Georgette replied: "I said I wouldn't INJURE you. I didn't say anything about TICKLING YOU BACK! SEE HOW YOU LIKE IT!!" She then tickled Oliver all over his belly, and since Oliver was even more ticklish than she was, he was laughing even louder, longer and harder than she had been seconds ago. Georgette was fully smiling all the while, while Oliver caterwauled(pun intended): "HAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!! NOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO!!! STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP IT! PLEHEHEHEHEHEHEASEHEHEHEHEHE STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP TICKLING MEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE!! I'M SOHOHOHOHOHAHAHAHAHAHAHARREHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEY, GEOHOHOHOHOHOHOHORGEHEHEHEHETE!!!!!! AHHHHHHHHHHHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP!!!!! I CAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAN'T STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAND BEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEING TICKLEHEHEHEHEHEHEHED!!! I'M BEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHAHAHAGGING YAHAHAHAHAHAHAHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOU!!!!! STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP IT!!! CAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAT IT OHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOUT! KNAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHACK IT OHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOFFAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!! MAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAKEHEHEHEHEHEHE IT STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP!!! EHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEND IT! QUIT IT!!! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!"

Tears of laughter were streaming out of his eyes by now, and what was Georgette's response to his begging? Would she stop tickling him?

she calls oliver and makes him slip and gets stuck to the vaccum cleaner
she uses the Vacuum cleaner to inflate oliver

*oliver walks into the room rubbing his eyes and yawning* Oliver: morning georgette...*yawns*.... is there anything to eat? *finally stops yawning to see georgette looking at a old vacuum cleaner* Oliver: whats with tha vacuum cleaner? you cleaning the house?

*georgette soon smiles a little evilly* Georgette: oh yes there is food, i will make it in a few mins. "she soon went to the kitchen with the vacuum cleaner and soon got it setted up and made the floors super slipery by the door and soon finished" now time to make brakefast *smiles evily*

145.content:
Unexpectedly, Roscoe and DeSoto had arrived! But they were supposed to be dead, so how could this be?

"Here, little kitty..." muttered DeSoto.

Georgette may not have been intimidating, but she wasn't about to let these fiends harm her little brother! "Leave him alone, you savages!" said Georgette.

The Dobermans were unimpressed. "Stay out of this, sister" said Roscoe. "You'll live longer!"

Georgette couldn't let her brother get eaten; how could she explain that? Just then, she got an idea of how to dispose of the Dobermans. She was going to...
145.title: Dangerous twist!

choices: Tito finally arrives at Georgette's place.
Georgette explains what happened to Tito.
Meanwhile back with the dobermans themselves.
1451.content:
As Georgette turned on the vacuum cleaner, she put the vacuum cleaner's upholstery nozzle into her mouth as she began inflating herself while she was becoming quite wider than before until she turned off the vacuum and pulled the upholstery nozzle out of her mouth.

"Now unhand him you fiends!" said Georgette.

Georgette herself was now at least 15 to 20 feet wide as her shadow was now looming over both dobermans themselves!

But the dobermans themselves weren't about to give up so easily. "Get her"! said Roscoe. "Right!" said Desoto.

Immediately, both dobermans charged toward Georgette until she grabbed both dobermans and sent them both of them flying out of the house with ease much to Oliver's amazement and Tito's shock just as he saw both dobermans flying.

Soon enough....
1451.title: Use the vacuum cleaner.

14513.content:
The two dobermans were hiding in a old run down building they claim as there new "base of operations" as Roscoe passes back and forth trying to figure out a plan to get back at the cat & his "big sister".

Roscoe growled deeply as he looked over at Desoto who just sat there looking vacant "Dang it Desoto! help me come up with a plan!" Roscoe huffed and snarled
14513.title: Meanwhile back with the dobermans themselves.

choices: They talk the alien dog demonstrates his powers
The alien gives Georgette some kind of growth potion
The alien gives Georgette some kind of Growth Ray/Device
The Alien gives Georgette some kind of strange amulet
The Alien zaps Georgette with some kind of strange ray then leaves
15.content:
Georgette was walking through the park by herself one night after going out to do her business.

She was humming to herself when a strange small UFO crash landed nearby, She went to check it out. When she got there a strange looking green dog came out and....


Btw sick of these inflation adds so here's the options
15.title: Georgette meets a little green alien puppy with...

151.content: What sort of powers does the alien puppy have?
151.title: Alien poochy powers.

1511.content: What kind of growth powers?
1511.title: Growth powers.

1512.content: Does Georgette get to be altered first?
1512.title: Equal to humans.

15122.content: Who else is turned into an Anthro?
15122.title: She's not alone!

1513.content: What kind of powers does the alien puppy have?
1513.title: Other-worldly powers.

15132.content:
"Who are you and why are you here?" Georgette asked the alien puppy.

"My name is Kang and as for why I'm here, you see I have been observing all of you earthling dogs from outer space for some time. Now then allow me to demonstrate my powers for you to see." Kang explained to Georgette.

"Powers? What powers?" Georgette asked with concern and nervousness.

Kang then used his alien powers to gain weight rapidly as Georgette watched him become completely fat as Kang stopped soon afterwards.

"You see I have powers beyond anything you have ever seen, in other words I have the power to be as fat as I want to be." Kang explained to Georgette.
15132.title: Weight gain powers.

152.content: What change does Georgette go through?
152.title: Alien brew.

153.content:
The alien puppy gave Georgette a wrapped box, then left (presumably to find bits of wreckage).

"How sweet of him" thought Georgette, though she had no idea what was in the box. She tore it open and found...
153.title: Extraterrestrial presents? How nice!

choices: 3000 feet tall or more! Move over Godzilla!
1531.content:
"How sweet of him" thought Georgette, though she had no idea what was in the box.


She tore it open and found a ray gun.
More specifically she found a growth ray.


This was evident by the various settings and knobs:

A switch labeled Enlarge - Normalize currently set to Enlarge

A switch labeled Continuous - Single use currently set to continuous


And a knob that was the power setting
Options were

100%
300%
500%
Mega

And No Limit


Georgette couldn't wait to try out the ray.

Carefully she tried to set it but she prematurely fired at herself a red beam surrounding her.

Soon Georgette began to grow until..
1531.title: A ray gun.

154.content:
The pup pulled out a necklace with a shining blue jewel and gave it to Georgette.

"Why, thank you, little one!" said Georgette. She slipped it around her neck easily enough, but she had no idea that the jewel had a special effect. That effect was...
154.title: Shiny!

15421.content: What type of breed did she become?
15421.title: Another dog breed.

15422.content: What kind of cat would Georgette become?
15422.title: Georgette's a cat!

15423.content: What else does she become?
15423.title: Something else.

154231.content: She is turned in what kind of Inanimate object?
154231.title: Inanimate object

154232.content: how about a big fat pig sow
154232.title: Somthing else

choices: Georgette slowly grows larger eventually to giant sizes thus truly "getting BIG"
Something else or other growing than size
1543.title: Something else.

15432.title: Something else or other growing than size

choices: I can transform into a fat green giant and keep you company.
154321.content:
After Georgette received that strange amulet from the alien puppy, the strange amulet's blue jewel lit up as Georgette began inflating to a giant size as her shadow was looming over the alien puppy and everything else until the jewel itself no longer lit up.

"What's happened to me? I've become a giant balloon like creature!" Georgette bellowed.

"That amulet you're wearing has a blue jewel that shall we say has a side effect of some sort, in other words you've inflated to a giant size of some sort." The alien puppy explained.

"Well what I can do now since I'm a giant balloon like creature?" Georgette asked.

Then the little green alien puppy answered....
154321.title: Yes

choices: Become a Super Hero & fight crime in New York City!
Play Toony pranks on Oliver & Jenny at home! (Mainly Oliver though!)
155.content: It turns out the ray give Georgette SUPER-ELASTIC powers & she can now stretch & shape-shift her body into anything she can imagine! The Alien Puppy leaves! Georgette decides to use to these new Elastic powers to...
155.title: Elastic Georgette!

1551.content: Will she stay a regular dog, or become an anthro for her superhero form?
1551.title: Super Georgette to the rescue!

choices: Recruit some new heroes to help.
15513.content: So, what's Georgette's first action as a superhero?
15513.title: Best of both worlds.

155132.content: Who does Georgette recruit first?
155132.title: The League of Super-Pets.

1551321.content: She's gonna ask Tito for help, isn't she?
1551321.title: We all know who this will be...

info.brief_description: This interactive story is about Georgette the poodle from the Disney movie Oliver&Company
info.description:
This is a weight gain/inflation/giants interactive about Georgette the poodle from the Disney movie "Oliver&Company".

*Please keep it clean.
*No vore or other such things.
*Marco is allowed.
*Try and keep the story line going.
*Most important of all,have fun with it.
